CustomField.description: The system automatically populates this optional picklist field to indicate the range of specified years the business has been in operation. By default, it is empty.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Select a value to indicate the range of specified years the business has been in operation.
CustomField.label: Time In Business Type

value.label: 1 - The number of years the applicant has been in business is collected or obtained by the financial institution
2 - Applicant has been in business less than two years
3 - Applicant has been in business two or more years
988 - Not provided by applicant and otherwise undetermined
